title: Stage Lv4-A2-S08
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Let me elaborate on that point. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: That's an excellent question. (variant 1)
Let me elaborate on that point. (variant 1)
I'd like to clarify what you mean exactly. (variant 1)
I'll check on that and get back to you. (variant 1)
Thank you for that valuable feedback. (variant 1)
I see you're looking at it from a different perspective. (variant 1)
You've pointed out something I missed. (variant 1)
There's a way to address that concern. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 더 질문 있으시면 언제든 말씀해 주세요. (v1)
sentences.en: Please feel free to ask if you have more questions. (variant 1)
Due to time constraints, I'll take one final question. (variant 1)
